quantum

of
 
space-time.
 
These
 
patterns
 
resonate
 
instantaneously,
 
forming
 
a
 
mycelial-like
 
lattice
 
of
 
dark
 
energy.

 ●  OmniNet  Nodes:  Instantaneously  resonant  points  across  the  quantum  hologram  that

Hypotheses  
1.  OmniNet  forms  a  mycelial  lattice  of  dark  energy  across  the  quantum  hologram.  
 2.  Nodes  resonate  instantaneously,  shaping  local  and  global  holographic  states.  
 3.  Human  and  organizational  alignment  occurs  when  nodes  are  activated.
